segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with the sink right there on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring out of the faucet and overflowing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there drying a plate, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already wet from the puddle forming on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's not noticing the mess at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the left, there's a boy climbing up on a stool to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar and holding a plate with the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is standing nearby, reaching up like she wants one too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky, hoping mom doesn't turn around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink shows a peaceful garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's crazy how calm it looks out there compared to this chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
